\documentclass{letter}
\usepackage[a5paper,landscape,margin=1.5cm]{geometry}
\usepackage{ebgaramond-maths} % Garamond font because i like it
\usepackage{tabularray} % For table

% This is the file that contains the information of the students. Generated by add_table().
% The info.tex from the repo is a placeholder.
\input{info.tex}

% Configuration
%% Edit these
\newcommand{\university}{Institut Teknologi Bandung} % Change with university's name
\newcommand{\faculty}{Sekolah Teknik Elektro dan Informatika} % Change with faculty's name
\newcommand{\studyprogram}{Program Studi Teknik Informatika} % Change with study program's name
\newcommand{\uniaddress}{Jalan Ganesha no. 10, Bandung, Jawa Barat, Indonesia 40132} % Change with university's address
\newcommand{\course}{IF2123 Aljabar Linear dan Geometri} % Change with course's name
\newcommand{\lecturername}{Nama Dosen} % Change with lecturer's name
\newcommand{\lettertitle}{
    \centering
    \textbf{\course}\\ 
    \textbf{Rincian Nilai} % Change with letter's title
    } 

% Formatting
%% Header
\newcommand{\createheader}{
    {\centering
        {
            \large
            \textsc{\university}\\
            \textsc{\faculty}\\
            \textsc{\studyprogram}\\[.25em]
        } 
        \uniaddress\\
    }
    {\centering\noindent\rule{0.95\linewidth}{0.4pt}\par}
}

%% For Indonesian date format (dd/mm/yyyy, do not use the WORST date format mm/dd/yyyy LMAO)
\renewcommand\today{$\number\day$\ %
\ifcase\month \or Januari%
\or Februari%
\or Maret%
\or April%
\or Mei%
\or Juni%
\or Juli%
\or Agustus%
\or September%
\or Oktober%
\or November%
\or Desember\fi\ $\number\year$}%
\date{\today\hspace{0.025\linewidth}}


\begin{document}

\begin{letter}{\lettertitle}
    \createheader

    \opening{Halo \studentname \ (\studentid),}
    Berikut adalah rincian nilai kamu untuk mata kuliah ini.

    \scoretable

    \signature{\lecturername}
    \closing{Salam,}

\end{letter}
\end{document}
